exercise.title: Same Pips
exercise.p: Make a program that randomizes two dice pips (noppaluku) until both pips are the same. At the end the program tells how many randomization rounds were needed.

ul.li: Write the code to a script element that you place inside the body element.
Initialize the count variable to be zero. That variable is used to count the randomization rounds.
Make a loop inside of which you randomize the two pips values until they will be the same. Use the while loop.

You can randomize the pips by
var pips1 = Math.round((Math.random() * 5) + 1);

exercise.p: Submit a link to your code (myy etc).
